Sorry, that was not a valid password QR code to be decrypted, or the input was malformed. Try again?
In order to use Mercury, you need to install Barcode Scanner. Would you like to be taken to the Android Market to download it?
No key pair found, generate key pair from menu
Transmit public key or encrypt new password from menu
Scan password or encrypt new password from menu
Generating a new keypair will make all previously generated password QR codes unusable. Are you sure you want to do this?
